dialogue: I'll schedule a zoom call with the whole team tomorrow to give the update.
Or you could tell me tomorrow, and I'll tell the rest of the team on our noon zoom call.
Um, okay. I'll send you a zoom link tomorrow.
Does our call need to be a video call? Can we do a voice call?
Well, yes, I guess we could just do a voice call.
Do we need to talk, or can you just send me an email?
I suppose I could just send you an email.
Okay, we're making progress. Now, have you heard of "texting"?
